about_the_game:
Wishlist now!

Immersive exposure therapy


Experience the power of virtual reality as you engage in immersive exposure therapy. Confront your phobias in a safe and controlled environment, gradually increasing exposure levels to build resilience.

Guided relaxation and mindfulness


Benefit from guided relaxation techniques and mindfulness exercises incorporated throughout the therapy sessions. Learn to manage anxiety, reduce stress, and cultivate a sense of calmness during the exposure process.

Personalized progress tracking


Track your progress and observe your growth over time. The app provides tools to monitor your anxiety levels, set goals, and review your achievements. Gain insights into your journey towards overcoming phobias.

Flexible and customizable experience

Tailor your exposure therapy to your specific needs. Choose from a range of phobias to work on, adjust the pace of progression, and utilize the option to hide triggers when needed. Take control of your therapy journey in a way that suits you best.

Different phobias to work on

Right now, Phobia Exposure VR includes 4 phobias, focusing on animal phobias, but we'd like to include more in the future.
These phobias are:
  • Arachnophobia : the fear of spiders
  • Ophidiophobia: the fear of snakes
  • Katsaridaphobia: the fear of cockroaches
  • Ranidaphobia: the fear of frogs and toads

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR

short_description: Phobia Exposure VR offers immersive exposure therapy in virtual reality. Conquer your fears with gradual levels of exposure, guided relaxation, and personal progress tracking. Overcome phobias at your own pace!
